# Example Multi-Phase Project

**Document Version:** 1.0
**Status:** Draft
**Date:** 2026-01-28
**Author:** Plan Converter
**Phase:** Planning

## Executive Summary

This is an example planning document to test the plan-to-epic converter.
It demonstrates the expected format for phase-based projects.

## Phase 1: Foundation Setup

### Phase 1.1: Infrastructure (Week 1)

**Tasks:**
1. Set up development environment
2. Configure CI/CD pipeline
3. Initialize project repository
4. Set up monitoring

**Deliverables:**
- ✅ Dev environment documented
- ✅ CI pipeline running
- ✅ Repository initialized

**Success Criteria:**
- All developers can build locally
- CI passes on main branch
- Monitoring dashboard accessible

### Phase 1.2: Core Framework (Week 2)

**Tasks:**
1. Implement base architecture
2. Set up testing framework
3. Create documentation structure
4. Define coding standards

**Deliverables:**
- ✅ Architecture doc complete
- ✅ Test suite running
- ✅ Coding standards published

**Success Criteria:**
- Architecture review approved
- 80%+ test coverage
- All code follows standards

## Phase 2: Feature Development

### Phase 2.1: User Management (Week 3)

**Tasks:**
1. Design user schema
2. Implement authentication
3. Add authorization
4. Create user API

**Deliverables:**
- ✅ Database schema deployed
- ✅ Auth system working
- ✅ API documented

**Success Criteria:**
- Users can register and login
- Permissions enforced correctly
- API tests pass

### Phase 2.2: Core Features (Week 4)

**Tasks:**
1. Implement feature A
2. Implement feature B
3. Add feature C
4. Integration testing

**Deliverables:**
- ✅ All features working
- ✅ Integration tests pass
- ✅ Performance benchmarks met

**Success Criteria:**
- Features meet requirements
- No critical bugs
- Performance targets achieved

## Phase 3: Testing and Deployment

### Phase 3.1: Quality Assurance (Week 5)

**Tasks:**
1. Comprehensive testing
2. Security audit
3. Performance optimization
4. Bug fixes

**Deliverables:**
- ✅ Test report complete
- ✅ Security issues resolved
- ✅ Performance optimized

**Success Criteria:**
- No critical bugs remain
- Security scan passes
- Load tests successful

### Phase 3.2: Deployment (Week 6)

**Tasks:**
1. Prepare production environment
2. Deploy to staging
3. Validation testing
4. Production deployment

**Deliverables:**
- ✅ Staging deployment successful
- ✅ Validation complete
- ✅ Production running

**Success Criteria:**
- Zero-downtime deployment
- All services healthy
- Monitoring shows green
